explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a light blue shirt is sitting cross-legged on a wooden board, holding a bowl full of meat in his left hand and a spoon with red sauce in his right hand. A large metal pot containing a lot of meat and broth is placed in front of him. Behind the man, a person wearing a pink shirt is holding a transparent plastic bag.

[0-8] The man pours the sauce from the spoon into the bowl of meat. Then, he shakes the spoon to the left, scoops a bit of meat from the pot with the broth, and puts it into the bowl. After placing the spoon on the edge of a bucket on his left, he picks up the bowl, revealing that the person holding the plastic bag behind him is a white-haired elderly man.
